route_random_sigma.description: the randomization sigma of edge weights, number 0 to 1

exploration_percentage.description: the percentage of routes we want to use for exploration, number 0 to 1

max_speed_and_length_factor.description: how much the length/speed influences the routing, number > 0 to inf

average_edge_duration_factor.description: how much the averageEdgeFactor influences the routing, number > 0 to inf

freshness_update_factor.description: how much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing, number 1 to inf

freshness_cut_off_value.description: if data is older than this we do not consider it in the algorithm, number 1 to inf

re_route_every_ticks.description: check for a new route very x times after the car starts, int 1 to inf

total_car_counter.description: the total number of cars in the simulation, int 0 to inf

edge_average_influence.description: how much the average edge duration influences the routing
